abstract.p: An IHTSDO Collaborative Environment for developing quality terminologies.

body.section:
Acknowledgements: This Guide, and the IHTSDO Toolkit it describes are the result of collaborative contributions from a number of organisations. The publishers hereby acknowledge and thank the following organisations:
Informatics Inc., Bend, Oregon USA.
http://www.informatics.com
National Centre for Classification in Health, Sydney Australia.
http://www.ncch.com.au
National E-Health Transition Authority, Sydney, Australia
http://www.nehta.gov.au.
Australian e-Health Research Centre, Brisbane, Australia
http://e-hrc.net

section.title: Editors:
